item.title: The Mysterious Death of Actress Divya Bharti â€“ A Detailed and Realistic Look
item.description: Divya Bharti was one of the brightest rising stars of Indian cinema in the early 1990s. With her expressive acting, natural charm, and impressive screen presence, she quickly became one of Bollywood’s most admired young actresses. But her life was tragically cut short at just 19 years of age. On April 5, 1993, she fell from the balcony of her fifth-floor apartment in Mumbai and passed away s
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
